current.slide-1-title: Farm Fresh Foods Delivered to your LA door at 50% Off
current.slide-2-title: Ripple Dairy Free Milk! All Flavors Available
current.slide-5-title: Cold Pressed, Light Filtered & Glass Bottled
current.home-feature-row-1-title: Local Farms & Food Delivered up to 50% Off
current.home-feature-1-text-below: We are farm direct. No shelf time, no long transit. The freshest possible food only.
current.home-feature-2-title: Save up to 50% vs grocery store
current.home-feature-2-text-below: We don’t have the warehouses, we don’t use trucking and no stores. All the savings are transferred to you.
current.home-feature-3-text-below: Sourcing from the local producer we offer products which are not available in supermarkets.
current.home-featured-farmer-description: Coldwater Canyon Provisions, created by Rondo Mieczkowski & Danny Barillaro, has been crafting small batch of jams, jellies, marmalades, pickles and preserves.  These batches are created in a certified commercial kitchen located in Pasadena CA, where Rondo himself uses only family heirloom and original recipes.  Only the finest certified organic and responsibly grown produce, sourced from local California family farmers. Their Strawberry-Rhubarb Jam won Best In Show for Jams and Jellies at the 2010 California State Fair.

current.about_program: To demonstrate how much we cherish our loyal customers, you can gain reward points in more ways than purchasing your favorite products.
current.referral_description: Here at our store, we firmly believe that sharing is caring. So now you've discovered our plant-powered products, it's time to get social. Invite your friends to our store and be instantly rewarded with reward points. And if they love them just as much as you do, you will continue to be rewarded again and again!
current.spending_description: Now that you have some hard earned points, here's how you can spend them.
current.st_answer_1: You can spend your points by click on the points tab while logged into your customer account. Under the Reward section, you can click Redeem next to the reward you want to claim it!You can spend your points by click on the points tab while logged into your customer account. Under the Reward section, you can click Redeem next to the reward you want to claim it!
current.st_question_2: How much does it cost to join?
current.st_answer_2: Our loyalty program is totally free! We do it to say 'thank you' to our awesome customers!
current.st_question_3: Is there a limit to how many order points I can get?
current.st_answer_3: Of course not! We want to reward your loyal orders!
current.home-testimonial-1-title: So Fresh I can taste it!
current.home-testimonial-1-description: I am very picky about my produce. I'm amazed how great these products look!
current.home-testimonial-2-description: I love their prices and promotions. So much savings and such a great deal!
current.home-testimonial-3-description: I love their fresh bread and bagels. Can't get from anywhere else. And their sauces and veggies are great finds.

settings.title: Carlos V.
settings.text:
Where were you born and grew up?
Hollywood and East Los Angeles.

What do you like about the schedule?
No traffic going home or coming to work.

Are you an early bird or night owl?
Night owl.

If you could have any animal as a pet what would it be?
Any reptile.

One interesting fact about yourself.
Trying to breed reptiles.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Golden Delicious Apple - Each batch is different. Some are sweeter than others, but all have been a great addition to my lunch.

settings.title: Cynthia M.
settings.text:
Where were you born and grew up? 
Grew up in the city of Norwalk.

What do you like about the schedule? 
It's not what I anticipated it to be, but the environment is enjoyable. Time runs by quick!

What is your favorite overall snack?
M&M peanuts

If you asked your friends how you drove, what would they say? 
"I'd hire you as my UBER driver" 

If you could have any animal as a pet what would it be? 
I already have three rescue dogs, so I'm content. If I could own a rescue center that'd be cool!

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Mangoes - These mangoes are delicious and ripe :)

settings.title: Fernando F.
settings.text:
Where were you born and grew up? 
Brazil.

What do you like about the schedule? 
Its flexibility allows me to go to school and take classes I wouldn't be able to take if I had a day time job.

What is your most interesting experience while working for Milk and Eggs? 
The growth in order volume in the past 6 months.

How long does it take you to run a mile? 
Under 6 minutes for sure.

Tell us one interesting fact about yourself.
I do not like the heat. It makes me angry.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Strawberries - There's something about a beautifully ripe batch of strawberries... they are so good!

settings.title: Heidi O.
settings.text:
What is your most interesting experience while working for Milk and Eggs? 
Saying "Good Morning" to people at night starts to make sense.

What are some of your hobbies?
I like going to Museums/Aquariums and drawing.

What is your favorite fresh fruit or vegetable?
Black olives.

If you could have any animal as a pet what would it be? 
Tiny whale shark.

Tell us one interesting fact about yourself.
I like DIY projects like re-purposing furniture and making tiny gardens.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Onions - I love onion rings and these are the perfect size for home-made onion rings!

settings.title: Isias F.
settings.text:
What do you like about the schedule? 
No traffic on the way in to work or on the way home.

What is the funniest experience you’ve had while working with Milk and Eggs? 
A particular prank we played on one of the other managers. Can't say too much or I'll get caught up.

What are some of your hobbies?
I love playing soccer and reading books. Recommend me some?

What is your favorite overall snack?
Sour candy, my weakness!

Tell us one interesting fact about yourself.
I got to play soccer with one of my favorite bands, Muse.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Oranges - This bag of oranges was juicy and sweet, fresh and excellent quality! The price is great for the quantity you receive in this package.

settings.title: Oliver T.
settings.text:
What’s your favorite thing about working for Milk and Eggs?
The fun atmosphere!

What’s your most interesting experience while working for Milk and Eggs?
The smells of downtown and the random fires.

What are some hobbies?
I enjoy snowboarding, all types of cars and vehicles, and video games.

If you asked your friends how you drove, what would they say?
That I attended an asian driving school.

One interesting fact about yourself.
I've snowboarded down a mountain at an average speed of 43mph covering 1.5 miles.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Kefir Probiotic Lowfat Plain - If you like regular yogurt, sour, this is for you. I will start keeping this in the house instead of buttermilk. Don't know why I haven't heard of this before, but it's a keeper!

settings.title: Paul R.
settings.text:
Where were you born and grew up? 
Monterey Park, CA

Are you an early bird or night owl? 
Early bird.

What is your most interesting experience while working for Milk and Eggs? 
A man yelled at me for parking in his driveway because there were houses on the block which were broken into. He later apologized when he found out I was there to deliver his order.

What are some of your hobbies?
Collecting rare concert DVDs as well as Joe Kapp memorabilia (he's my cousin). 

If you could be any animal, what would you be?
A redtail hawk.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Peanut Butter - Produce is so fresh, but I love the peanut butter best!

settings.title: Richard R.
settings.text:
Where were you born and grew up? 
Born in Pasadena, CA and grew up in Lancaster, CA

What is your most interesting experience while working for Milk and Eggs?
At a previous event, we played a game where each person had to touch a ball. Only one person can touch the ball at a time and you cannot pass to the person directly next to you on your left or right. As a team there were about 10 of us and we had to record the fastest time to pass the ball between every person. The first time we were well past a minute. After some adjustments and motivation to get a faster time, we were able to complete the time in under 2 seconds. (Side note, I think we could do it faster)

What is funniest experience you’ve had while working with Milk and Eggs?
Fernando singing Alejandro.

What is your favorite overall snack?
Pistachios

Tell us one interesting fact about yourself.
I am obsessed with food even though I am a picky eater. I can eat a ridiculous amount of food in 1 sitting and do not really enjoy "snacks" because they are not filling enough for me lol.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Avocados - Perfect ripeness and way cheaper than the grocery store. I couldn't wait to make home made guacamole when it came in.

settings.title: Robert D.
settings.text:
What is your favorite thing about working for Milk and Eggs?
The quality of products and amazing coworkers.

What are some of your hobbies?
Playing guitar and cooking new dishes.

What is your favorite fresh fruit or vegetable?
My favorite fruit is a banana.

If you could be any animal, what would you be?
I would be a sloth. No real predators.

Tell us one interesting fact about yourself.
I can connect five in Connect Four.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Grapes - These are so delicious. Very vibrant in color and very sweet and tart.

settings.title: Shirley J.
settings.text:
What’s your favorite thing about working for Milk and Eggs?
Favorite thing about M&E is driving to and seeing new places and routes. I've never seen so many beautiful places in LA.

What is your most interesting experience while working for Milk and Eggs? 
Working the events has been very interesting as I'm usually very reserved and shy. However, talking about M&E comes easy and I'm proud to introduce a great company to those who wouldn't have heard of it otherwise. Also, learning of some of the products that I wouldn't have heard of otherwise as well. 

What is your most interesting experience while working for Milk and Eggs?
Picking the wrong veggies and being embarrassed for not knowing better, for instance, not knowing the difference between red potatoes and sweet potatoes/yams! >_<  lol

What is your favorite thing in Los Angeles? 
Favorite thing in LA is the diversity, not just with people - you can be in a concrete jungle one minute and find yourself in a unimaginable forest in the next few. Beauty everywhere...

Tell us one interesting fact about yourself.
My utmost desire is to get certified in Horticulture, buy land and grow a farm and family.

What is your favorite item from Milk and Eggs?
Cauliflower - I like cauliflower in anything or plain. Last night I cooked the cauliflower after having it for more than a few weeks ago. Not a brown spot on it!

settings.name: — Mary C
settings.title: Amazingly fresh natural products!
settings.content: I love their fresh bread and bagels. Can’t get from anywhere else. And their sauces and veggies are great finds.”

settings.content: I love their prices and promotions. So much savings and such a great deal!”

settings.content: I love their fresh bread and bagels. Can’t get from anywhere else. And their sauces and veggies are great finds.”
